section.title: List Project Types
section.para: To view a list of Project Types, select the Project Type menu option. The following screen will be displayed:

section.title: New Project Type
section.para:
To add a new Project Type, click the NEW button on the Project Types list screen. The following will be displayed:
New Project Type

You are presented with the following options:
Code
Enter a code to identify the Project Type.
Description
Enter a description for the Project Type.
Active
Select to indicate that the project is currently active.
If "Active" is not selected, the Project Type will not be available for selection under a new or existing Project.
